item.description:
We will have our own Inaugural Ball tonight playing cribbage and having F*U*N ! !

However, since this is the Inaugural Ball - YOU CAN NOT SKUNK MICKI - how about just for tonight you can't do that.....Emad did it to me and so did Greta.....But I got Betsy firstest :)

Lots of new people and lots of F*U*N playing cribbage when we are not discussing our lives and our pursuits of happiness!

Come on down to our 2009 Inaugural Ball cribbage meet up and meet some wonderful fantastic and F*U*N people :)
item.how_to_find_us: With our cribbage boards out in the back room :)
item.name: Waltham Inaugural Ball Cribbage Meet Up
